content.prompt: Which of the following best explains Lt. Colonel Ojukwu’s purpose in including the information in the first paragraph in his independence proclamation?

choices.label: He wanted to emphasize the continued economic exploitation of Nigeria by Western global capitalism.
He wanted to convince Nigeria’s elected government to compensate Eastern Nigerians for the economic sacrifices they had made in building the country.
He wanted to advocate for a pan-African solution to the continent’s pressing economic and social problems.
He wanted to outline a list of East Nigerian grievances in order to justify the political action he was about to take.

topic.text: 8.7: Global Resistance to Established Power Structures after 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
